verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Walinizunguka kama nyuki,
(lakini)
lakini walizimika kama moto,
kama moto wa miibani.
Walinizunguka kama nyuki,
(adui)
lakini walizimika kama moto,
kama moto wa miibani.

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Mataifa yote yalinizunguka mimi,
kweli,
walinizungunka mimi
kwa jina la bwana
niliwapatilia mbali
wote walionisumbua.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Kwani Bwana yuko upande
wangu mimi anisaidia,
sitaogopa.
Nanitawaona wanaonichukia
hakika nitawaona wameshindwa.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Heri yetu sote kumkimbila
Bwana Mungu kuliko wanadamu.
Heri yetu sote kumkimbila
Bwana kuliko kutumanina wakuu.
